verse: नमोऽस्त्वनन्ताय सहस्रमूर्तये सहस्रपादाक्षिशिरोरुबाहवे । सहस्रनाम्ने पुरुषाय शाश्वते सहस्रकोटी युगधारिणे नमः ॥
overall_meaning: Salutations to the Infinite, with thousand forms, thousand-footed and thousand-eyed, with heads and arms, with thousand names, to the eternal Supreme Being, sustainer of epochs with thousand crores.
